name: Arena3310
description:
Game made for Nokia3310 JAM 2 ( https://itch.io/jam/nokiajam2 )

The game is about swaping between Ghost-form and Body-form to survive in the grand Arena3310! The body must survive and the ghost can kill

Keybindings:

'V' Swaps between Ghost and Body

'X' Dash/Run

'Z' Melee attack while in Ghost form...

'C' Range attack while in Ghost form...

The goal:

Survive and collect as much as possible amount of souls... Good luck and have fun!

Headphones warning!
